text.title: Man steals dying lorry crash victim's purse in Greater Manchester, England
text.head: Man steals dying lorry crash victim's purse in Greater Manchester, England
Sources

list.item: "Police investigate after purse stolen" — Greater Manchester Police , February 6, 2015
"Purse stolen as pensioner lay dying" — Wigan Today , February 6, 2015
Sophie Arnold. "Woman dies after being hit by lorry in Leigh" — Leigh Journal , February 4, 2015
